title: European Communities Act 1972 (No. 27 of 1972) and for the purpose of
heading: 1. These Regulations may be cited as the European Union (Planning and
text_raw:
1. These Regulations may be cited as the European Union (Planning and 
Development, Maritime and Valuation (Amendment) Act 2022) (Amendment) 
Regulations 2022.
text_norm: 1 regulation may cited european union (planning development maritime valuation (amendment) act 2022) (amendment) regulation 2022

title: European Communities Act 1972 (No. 27 of 1972) and for the purpose of
heading: In these Regulations, “Act of 2022” means the Planning and
text_raw:
2. 

In these Regulations, “Act of 2022” means the Planning and 
Development, Maritime and Valuation (Amendment) Act 2022 (No. 29 of 
2022).
text_norm: 2 regulation act 2022 mean planning development maritime valuation (amendment) act 2022 (no 29 2022)

title: European Communities Act 1972 (No. 27 of 1972) and for the purpose of
heading: 3. Section 3 of the Act of 2022 is deemed not to have come into operation
text_raw:
3. Section 3 of the Act of 2022 is deemed not to have come into operation 
on the date of passing of that Act and shall not come into operation until 
provided for pursuant to any Act or statutory instrument.
text_norm: 3 section 3 act 2022 deemed come operation date passing act shall come operation provided pursuant act statutory instrument

title: European Communities Act 1972 (No. 27 of 1972) and for the purpose of
heading: 4. Section 1(4) of the Act of 2022 is amended by the substitution of
text_raw:
4. Section 1(4) of the Act of 2022 is amended by the substitution of 

“sections 4 to 7” for “sections 3 to 7”. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

13 October, 2022. 

DARRAGH O’BRIEN, 

Minister for Housing, Local Government and Heritage. 

1 O.J. L241, 17.9.2015 p. 1. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 14th October, 2022.
